alert.note: Alert for Coahoma (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 5:12PM CDT until September 06 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Phillips County in eastern Arkansas... Central Coahoma County in northwestern Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 512 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Crumrod, or near White River National Wildlife Refuge, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Clarksdale, Elaine, White River National Wildlife Refuge, Jonestown, Kings, Sherard, Crumrod, Lyon, Rena Lara, Mosby Spur, Ferguson, Modoc, Hoop Spur, Beverly, Clover Hill, Ratio, Lundell, Farrell, Mellwood and Hopson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
